title: Journey To Zelindar
description: Journey to Zelindar Sair is the pampered daughter of an upper-caste family until a brutal gang rape changes her life forever. Abandoned and left for dead, she walks to the ocean to kill herself. Instead she is rescued by the Hadra, wild riding-women with strange powers, women who ride their horses by consent, speak mind-to-mind with each other and are all lovers of women. This is Sair's own tale of her life and adventures among the Hadra, a journey that will finally take her to the fabled city of Zelindar.
author: Diana Rivers
